Package com.cratediggers.service

Class CustomerServices

java.lang.Object
com.cratediggers.service.CustomerServices
public class CustomerServices
extends java.lang.Object
Handles all business logic for the customer module. Follows model-view-controller design architecture by ensuring that the model and view never interact directly.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private CustomerDAO customerDAO
    CustomerDAO object used to interact with the database (the model).
    private javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request
    Contains parameters received by a HTTP request.
    private javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response
    Used to store attributes that are utilised for JSP generation.

  • Constructor Details

    • CustomerServices

      public CustomerServices​(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      Constructs an CustomerServices object containing the request and response objects provided by a servlet. Constructs new customerDAO objects used to interact with the database (the model).
      Parameters:
      request - object that contains parameters received in HTTP request made to the server.
      response - object that is used to store attributes which are utilised for JSP generation.

  • Method Details

    • listCustomers

      public void listCustomers​(java.lang.String message) throws javax.servlet.ServletException, java.io.IOException
      Retrieves a list of all customers from database. Forwards the list and a specified message onto "customer_list.jsp" to display to users.
      Parameters:
      message - to be displayed at top of JSP page
      Throws:
      javax.servlet.ServletException
      java.io.IOException

    • listCustomers

      public void listCustomers() throws javax.servlet.ServletException, java.io.IOException
      Provides polymorphism so that listCustomers(String message) can be called without a specified message.
      Throws:
      javax.servlet.ServletException
      java.io.IOException

    • createCustomer

      public void createCustomer() throws javax.servlet.ServletException, java.io.IOException
      Retrieves email parameters from request object and find the customer object with the given email. Checks if customer with given email already exists (email must be unique). If customer can be created then retrieves all parameters from request object and creates new customer object. CustomerDAO creates the record in the database (the model) and displays list of all customers in view. If not, generates and displays error message.
      Throws:
      javax.servlet.ServletException
      java.io.IOException

    • updateCustomerFieldsFromForm

      private void updateCustomerFieldsFromForm​(Customer customer)
      Reads all fields of a customer form stored as parameters in request object. Sets fields of provided customer object equal to the specified parameters. Encrypts password field.
      Parameters:
      album - to have fields set
      Throws:
      javax.servlet.ServletException
      java.io.IOException

    • registerCustomer

      public void registerCustomer() throws javax.servlet.ServletException, java.io.IOException
      Retrieves email parameters from request object and find the customer object with the given email. Checks if customer with given email already exists (email must be unique). If customer can be created then retrieves all parameters from request object and creates new customer object. CustomerDAO creates the record in the database (the model) and displays link to login in view. If not, generates and displays error message.
      Throws:
      javax.servlet.ServletException
      java.io.IOException

    • editCustomer

      public void editCustomer() throws javax.servlet.ServletException, java.io.IOException
      Obtains customer object that corresponds to the id provided as a parameter in the request object. If album exists then display "customer_form.jsp" in the view, setting the customer object as an attribute in the response object so that pre-existing customer object information can auto-fill in form fields. If album does not exist then displays error message.
      Throws:
      javax.servlet.ServletException
      java.io.IOException

    • updateCustomer

      public void updateCustomer() throws javax.servlet.ServletException, java.io.IOException
      Finds the customer objects that currently contains the specified customerId and email. Checks if an customer object with the given email exists that contains a different customerId to that which was specified. If this is the case, generates and displays in the view an error message since email must be unique. Otherwise, modifies the object that contains the specified customerId by reading all the form fields stored as parameters in the request object and updates it in the database (the model).
      Throws:
      javax.servlet.ServletException
      java.io.IOException

    • deleteCustomer

      public void deleteCustomer() throws javax.servlet.ServletException, java.io.IOException
      Obtains customer object that corresponds to the id provided as a parameter in the request object. If this customer does not exist then an error message is generated and displayed to the user in the view. The corresponding record is deleted in the database (the model) and the user informed by a message.
      Throws:
      javax.servlet.ServletException
      java.io.IOException

    • showLogin

      public void showLogin() throws javax.servlet.ServletException, java.io.IOException
      Redirects the customer to the "login.jsp" page.
      Throws:
      javax.servlet.ServletException
      java.io.IOException

    • doLogin

      public void doLogin() throws javax.servlet.ServletException, java.io.IOException
      Retrieves email, and password parameters from request object. Checks whether login should be allowed (whether customer record with given email contains the specified password). If true then sets the session loggedCustomer attribute so that the customer can bypass the site's customerLoginFilter. Displays the page that the customer was redirected from by the customerLoginFilter or the customer profile page if not redirected. If false, displays login failure message and displays "login.jsp" page to user again.
      Throws:
      javax.servlet.ServletException
      java.io.IOException

    • showCustomerProfile

      public void showCustomerProfile() throws javax.servlet.ServletException, java.io.IOException
      Redirects the customer to the "customer_profile.jsp" page.
      Throws:
      javax.servlet.ServletException
      java.io.IOException

    • showCustomerProfileEditForm

      public void showCustomerProfileEditForm() throws javax.servlet.ServletException, java.io.IOException
      Redirects the customer to the "edit_profile.jsp" page.
      Throws:
      javax.servlet.ServletException
      java.io.IOException

    • updateCustomerProfile

      public void updateCustomerProfile() throws javax.servlet.ServletException, java.io.IOException
      Retrieves logged in customer object from session. Updates the object fields according to form fields stored as parameter in request object. Updates the corresponding record in the database (the model).
      Throws:
      javax.servlet.ServletException
      java.io.IOException

    • newCustomer

      public void newCustomer() throws javax.servlet.ServletException, java.io.IOException
      Redirects user to "customer_form.jsp" page.
      Throws:
      javax.servlet.ServletException
      java.io.IOException

    • showCustomerRegistrationForm

      public void showCustomerRegistrationForm() throws javax.servlet.ServletException, java.io.IOException
      Redirects customer to "register_form.jsp" page.
      Throws:
      javax.servlet.ServletException
      java.io.IOException
